title: The Mammoth Book of Gorgeous Guys: Erotic Photographs of Men
description: This collection of erotic art features over 400 erotic portraits of male nudes, some of them tastefully explicit, from some of the world's leading photographers. This stunning collection brings together the best work, in both black-and-white and color images, of over 50 different artists from all over the world.
author: Barbara Cardy
